mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(L.CMT_ID) FROM LIKED L JOIN COMMENTS c ON L.CMT_ID = c.CMT_ID WHERE c.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}

SELECT J.JNL_TITLE , COUNT(DISTINCT JP.PICK_ID), J.JNL_VIEWS, COUNT(DISTINCT C.CMT_ID), COALESCE(SUM(L.CMT_ID), 0) FROM JOURNAL J LEFT JOIN JOURNAL_PICK JP ON J.JNL_NUM = JP.JNL_NUM LEFT JOIN COMMENTS C ON J.JNL_NUM = C.CMT_POST_ID AND C.CMT_POST_TYPE = 'J' LEFT JOIN LIKED L ON C.CMT_ID = L.CMT_ID WHERE J.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum} GROUP BY J.JNL_TITLE, J.JNL_VIEWS ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT JP.PICK_ID) DESC

SELECT 'TEMPLATE' AS PICK_TYPE, t.TEMP_TITLE AS TITLE FROM TEMPLATE_PICK tp JOIN TEMPLATE t ON tp.TEMP_ID = t.TEMP_ID WHERE tp.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum} UNION ALL SELECT 'JOURNAL' AS PICK_TYPE, j.JNL_TITLE AS TITLE FROM JOURNAL_PICK jp JOIN JOURNAL j ON jp.JNL_NUM = j.JNL_NUM WHERE jp.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum} UNION ALL SELECT 'PLACE' AS PICK_TYPE, p.PLACE_NAME AS TITLE FROM PLACE_PICK pp JOIN PLACE p ON pp.PLACE_ID = p.PLACE_ID WHERE pp.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum}

SELECT P.PLAN_TITLE, (P.PLAN_END_DATE-P.PLAN_START_DATE) as PERIOD, P.PLAN_START_DATE, P.PLAN_END_DATE, COUNT(PP.PLACE_ID) as "PLACE_CNT" FROM PLAN P LEFT JOIN PLAN_PLACE PP ON P.PLAN_ID = PP.PLAN_ID WHERE P.MEMBER_NUM = #{memberNum} GROUP BY P.PLAN_TITLE, P.PLAN_START_DATE, P.PLAN_END_DATE ORDER BY P.PLAN_START_DATE
